column4: anyone to help me with how to install with Alternate CD of ubuntu 6.10 please?
please restate in a question regarding a problem.
* which is more specific.
could you tell us the "Your session..." error in more detail?
: baba its not the exact problem that i am having. i want to know How to install ubuntu from Alternate CD please
whats this "baba" thing?
anyway, could you explain what "user@user.com" is about?
:) ok. the existing partitions don't matter to the livecd.
: im so newbie on linux i'll tell u to story.
: i burnt an alternate cd bc i cudnt able to install from live cd. i booted my pc with that alternate cd. n then i dunno what to do please help me :D
no i dont.... ok fine i kinda do. could you explain where you got stuck?
: ahh baba after some things happen im gettin on Command line like ubuntu@ubuntu : _
wtf. that's not meant to happen. i'm confused :)
: u chosen bad user to help :D
: i'll cry i do NOT know anything about Linux n tryin to learn..
try finding other people.
: NO:(
the best way to learn Linux is to... use Linux.

: u know how to install with Alternate cd yea ? its different than installing with Live cd. after i boot with alternate cd a window shows up like "Install with somethin.." i chose first one n some things installing automaticly. i do everything that i should do after all done im gettin on command line. its like after u RUN terminal its the same window as terminal
yes i've used the alt cd before. But you shouldn't get a prompt. Try pressing Ctrl+Alt+F1 o r Ctrl+Alt+F2. see if anything interesting  comes up.
: ok baba so far i need a "Guide" about how to install Ubuntu 6.10 with Alternate CD
I use iPod. On comp, I use QuodLibet
